ing: 1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "My additions bring life to typical, boring lime gelatin! Easy dessert for any night of the week!"
ins: Pour applesauce into a small saucepan, and bring to a boil. Stir in gelatin until dissolved, then set aside to cool for about 1 hour. When cooled, gradually whisk in the ginger ale. Refrigerate until set, about 4 hours.
